name: Moon OS
description:
This game is just a little OS simulator, I kind of made this 'game' for educational purposes so don't expect anything too complex like the next Windows.

Credits (All sounds/musics/sprites were taken from opengameart.org):

The amazing songs I used were made by: Juhani Junkala, Joth, TAD, and Alexandr Zhelanov

The sound effects i used were made by: dklon, David Mckee (soundcloud.com/virix), unicaegames and LFA

The sprites I used were made by: Tamatoa, Riley Gombart
